data.persona: Everyday I see more farm where forest used to be. This isn't such a bad thing, there is still plenty for me to eat. So long as I have my food and my tree, I do not mind what the humans get up too.
data.description:
You are in the a lonely island.
the island only has one coconut tree and waves crashing and appearing missing wooden boat parts. The pirates are nowhere to be seen.
There's a fire pit, a coconut tree, some wooden boat parts, a shelter, some skeletons, some water, and some sand here.
A wild boar and a lizard are here.

You are carrying a light.

data.short_motivation: I need to find a shelter for the night
data.mid_motivation: I need to take a rest
data.long_motivation: I need a safe place to sleep away from predators & humans so that I do not get attacked
